title: There could have been an end to all bombing
creator: Hertling, Georg  Payer, Friedrich  Solf, Wilhelm Heinrich  Czernin von und zu Chudenitz, Ottokar Theobald  Erzberger, Matthias
subject: Krieg 1914 1918
source: Hertling, Georg  Payer, Friedrich  Solf, Wilhelm Heinrich  Czernin von und zu Chudenitz, Ottokar Theobald  Erzberger, Matthias: There could have been an end to all bombing  if your ministers had not rebuked our attempts to have a conference in a natural country .... Berlin
alternative: if your ministers had not rebuked our attempts to have a conference in a natural country ...
